title: What mantras to chant during Navratri? - Quora

response.answer_text: Navratri bhajans and Durga mantras: Make the festive atmosphere of Navratri even more blissful by listening to some of Goddess Durga's popular bhajans/songs and chanting some of her powerful mantras. The mantras to chant during navaratri are : Sarva Mangala Mangalye, Shive Sarvartha Sadhika Sharanye Trayambake Gauri, Narayani Namostute Meaning: The one who bestows auspiciousness on one and all, the one who accomplishes all objectives, to the mother of the three worlds, O Gauri, I bow again and again to you. Benefits: By regularly chanting this mantra, one can accomplish all the four objectives of life - Dharma (dutybound living), Artha (wealth), Kama (desires) and Moksha (liberation). Sarva Swarupe Sarveshe, Sarva Shakti Samanvite Bhaye Bhyastraahi No Devi, Durge Devi Namostute Meaning: OM. You exist in everything, you possess infinite powers. Devi, please protect us from all fears, we salute to you O Durga Devi. Benefit: Chanting this powerful mantra that will help us eliminate fear, our most dreaded enemy. Etatte vadanam saumyam lochana trayabhushitam Paatu nah sarvabhiitibhyah kaatyaayani namostute Meaning: O mother with a beautiful face, adorned with three eyes, protect me from all that exists, Maa Katyayani I bow to you. Benefits: One can derive strength and courage by chanting this mantra regularly. Shanti karmani sarvatra tatha duh swapna darshane| Grah pidaasu chograsu maahaatmyam srinu yaanmam Benefits: Eliminate fear and nightmares from your life by chanting this mantra. The Mantra also has the power to overpower harmful or dangerous planetary positions that may have ill-effects on you. Sarva badhavinirmukto dhan dhanya sutanvitah Manushyo matprasaden bhavishyati na sanshayam Benefits: This Mantra will remove obstacles and roadblocks on your road to success and growth. Also, if you wish you conceive, regularly chanting this mantra can bless you with an offspring. For more information related to navratri visit : Home - Predictions For Success
